Package org.coronabounce.controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coronabounce.controllers.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controllable
    public class Controller
extends Object
implements Controllable
    Class Controller is a auxiliary to MainController and SettingsController. It provide initial values of constants and methods to change them in the course of using the program.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.coronabounce.mvcconnectors.Controllable

        Controllable.eState
